info.narration: #0 is on their way to $0’s Containment Unit to begin the work process.

collection.name: The Firebird
collection.openText: Those who succeed in the hunt are granted with one of the very feathers that countless hunters once yearned for.

specialTipSize.specialTip: When another Abnormality escaped in the department in which $0 was contained, the Qliphoth Counter lowered.
When the work result was Good, the Qliphoth Counter lowered.
When the work result was Normal, the Qliphoth Counter lowered with a low probability. Furthermore, the lower the Qliphoth Counter, the more damage Agents take while working with $0.
When the work result was Bad, the Qliphoth Counter increased.
$0 granted light to #0 who worked with it when the Qliphoth Counter was 1. #0’s HP and SP were recovered, and healed over time for a while.
When an Agent had less than 20% of their max HP remaining after completing the work process, $0 granted the same light.

After escaping, $0 eventually willingly returned to its Containment Unit after a short while. $0 only displayed aggression after it was damaged, and the employee whose HP or SP reached 0 from its attacks died. When $0 was attacked, the eyes of those who injured it were scorched by the light emitted by the Abnormality. Blinded employees worked at half-speed. $0 cured #0’s eye injury when they finished the work process.
